ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Carnal pauldrons
ygData.msgSnippet: Everything in Sol B sees through invis naturally. Rokenn
ygData.messageBody:
Everything in Sol B sees through invis naturally.

Rokenn

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Scott Malin [mailto:Thanos0000@...]
> Sent: Thursday, July 20, 2000 11:59 AM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Carnal pauldrons
>
>
> Either Kobolds see invis by nature or they cast it as they
> spawn, I've seen
> to recall a "greater kobold begins to cast" although it might
> have been a
> shaman class although I thought I noted it as strange at the
> time thinking
> it wasn't one.
>
> When I was in SolB the other night with my ranger character
> we had 2 of them
> rot cause nobody needed/wanted them. I hadn't thought about
> it but maybe
> I'll park my bard outside and switch off if we get another
> drop. Hmmm ...
> hows the hunting in Lavastorm for a level 17 bard?
>
> Reedwind - Bard
> Underbrush - Ranger
> Terris-Thule
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Cyr, Thierry" <thierry.cyr@...>
> To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
> Sent: Thursday, July 20, 2000 2:42 PM
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Carnal pauldrons
>
>
> > reguarding invis in sol b, i know that the kobs and stuff
> see through the
> > necro invis (gather shadows). most probably see through
> bard invis too
> >
> > -Minkin
> >
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Elijah Meeker [mailto:emeeker@...]
> > Sent: Thursday, July 20, 2000 2:20 PM
> > To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> > Subject: [eqbards] Carnal pauldrons
> >
> >
> >
> > Has anyone tried to get these at a low level? Or does
> anyone know SolB
> well
> > enough to say whether a low level could make the dash to
> loot them (and
> > survive waiting for them to drop)? Would I need inviso, or are there
> things
> > that see through it along the way (on, say a busy weekend night)?
> >
> > As a possibly inappropriate aside, should there just
> HAPPEN to be someone
> > on the list who has spare money or items on Nameless and
> wants to have a
> > character on Povar who suddenly gets an inheritance, they
> should feel free
> > to contact me, Tszaaz/Tsengu would be happy to talk to you *smile*
> >
> > Tszaaz-Povar/Tsengu-Nameless
> >
> >
> >
> >
> > [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
> >
> >
> >
